Text:
While not overtly misleading (aside from the INCORRECT cover image) the title of this torrent would *BEST* be identified as a compilation DVD entitled Chased by Dinosaurs (2004).

Included in the first torrent file "Walking With Dinosaurs - BBC Video.mkv" are five 30 min episodes (each effectively a follow-up produced by the BBC to their original 6-part Walking With Dinosaurs series)…


A Walking with Dinosaurs Special:  Land of the Giants (TV 2002)
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0491559/


A Walking with Dinosaurs Special:  The Giant Claw (TV 2002)
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p0096c97
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0470772/


A Walking with Dinosaurs Trilogy:  Sea Monsters (TV 2003)
Episode 1:  Dangerous Seas
Episode 2:  Into the Jaws of Death
Episode 3:  To Hell..... and Back?
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p008c6n4
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0469006/


…AND a 50 minute bonus video "Walking With Dinosaurs Bonus - Extreme Dinosaurs.mkv":

Horizon:  Extreme Dinosaurs (TV 2000)
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0605149/
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p008d954


THANK YOU rambam1776 for the upload, the orig description is certainly not bad…but I thought the above information might prove a helpful supplement. ;)

p.s. Encode A/V quality is a solid 8/8, or so!

^- All that being said, if you're after the "REAL DEAL" (a *SOLID* QUALITY copy of the BBC's original 6-part Walking With Dinosaurs), look no further than…
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8535216
